description: remind me of the good old days
I haven't tried this and I don't think I will in a while but this is great idea

i love this editor its really easy to use if you take about 30 mins to lurn the basics i dont know why but thay didnt make a guide them selfs so i just looked it up my self and found a good one


                   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6ZZfIQsXyzo



i just dont get why poeple here are just saying how its 5 out of 5 when thay dont give it a review, its just a prob i have with the ratings here,

BUT its a really good editor and works with lots of source ports like gzdoom lzdoom and zdoom, for gzdoom and lzdoom to run the levels you made just use the add nodes and make sure your level pack is made with zdoom as the sellected source port, hope the video helps to :-)
summary: good. justs the not good ratings here make it seem not good but it is

description: Mind blowing when you consider what we had back in the 1990s for making wads. Just annoying as a beginner to make doors exit the level, I even tried following tutorials on YT and was confused at first, lol. Very glad this project exists though.
